title: Margaret River Region Luxe Self-Contained Stay with Private Beach Access & Welcome Wine
description:
Luxe beach house dreams are made a reality at The Aqua Resort Busselton, a beachfront resort overlooking Geographe Bay in Western Australia's southwest, a short drive from the renowned Margaret River wine region. Nestled on eight and a half acres of peppermint tree woodlands with the ocean practically lapping at its doorstep, these self-contained houses are stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award.  

Spend days in the glistening infinity pool, sweat it out at the fitness centre, relax in the steam room, or practise your serve on the tennis court. The pièce de resistance is direct beach access, where you can enjoy your own slice of Geographe Bay’s white sandy shores and pristine waters. Busselton is the gateway to Margaret River’s wine region, and in less than a 30-minute drive, you will be at some of the region’s best cellar doors. If you're after the perfect introduction, look no further than The Aqua Resort Busselton's winery bundle experience, which includes wine tasting at McHenry Hohnen, a sampling of Western Australia's finest cheeses at The Margaret River Dairy Company and more.
offer_address: 605 Bussell Highway, Busselton, Western Australia 6280, Australia

title: Margaret River Region Luxe Self-Contained Stay with Direct Beach Access
description:
Luxe beach house dreams are made a reality at The Aqua Resort Busselton, a beachfront resort overlooking Geographe Bay in Western Australia's southwest, a short drive from the renowned Margaret River wine region.

Nestled on 8.5 acres of peppermint tree woodlands with the ocean practically lapping at its doorstep, these self-contained houses are stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award. Spend days in the glistening infinity pool, sweat it out at the fitness centre, relax in the steam room, or practice your serve on the tennis court. The pièce de resistance is direct beach access, where you can enjoy your own slice of Geographe Bay’s white sandy shores and pristine waters. Busselton is the gateway to Margaret River’s wine region, and in less than a 30-minute drive, you will be at some of the region’s best cellar doors, including Swings & Roundabouts, Amelia Park, and Brookwood Estate.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy a tipple of Margaret River’s finest drop with a welcome bottle of local wine
- Graze on the region’s best produce with a gourmet box of sweet and savoury treats

**Travelling as a group?** Upgrade to the spacious Three Bedroom Grove House for six people, with an outdoor entertainment area and private garden.
offer_address: 605 Bussell Highway, Busselton, Western Australia 6280, Australia

title: Relaxing Self-Contained Apartment Escape near Margaret River Wine Region
description:
Experience the enchanting, laidback vibes of one of Australia's most famous gourmet food and wine regions with a stay at The Sebel Busselton - currently ranked within the top three hotels in Busselton on Tripadvisor. A modern property with luxe apartment-style accommodation, this self-contained sanctuary is located a scenic 2.5-hour drive south of Perth, near the azure waters of Geographe Bay.

With its prime location just a 30-minute drive from the iconic Margaret River region, The Sebel Busselton is the perfect home base as you explore all this amazing area has to offer - including world-class wineries, beautiful beaches and stunning coastline. Revel in the relaxed atmosphere of this seaside town with a game on the two squash and tennis courts or dips in the resort-style swimming pools, before you hit the road to discover the likes of Busselton Jetty, Vasse Felix, the Cape to Cape Track and the famous surf of Yallingup Beach.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Rest easy on the final day of your stay with late 12pm late checkout
- Enjoy a bottle of wine on departure as a parting gift to remember your relaxing stay

**Travelling with family or friends?** Choose the Three-Bedroom Apartment for up to six guests and enjoy the convenience of an upstairs loft, fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities.
offer_address: 553 Bussell Highway, Busselton 6280, Western Australia, Australia

title: WA: Apartment Stay near Margaret River
description:
Enjoy the finer things in life near the world-class wineries, beautiful beaches and stunning coastline of the Margaret River region. Experience the laid-back vibes of one of Australia's most famous gourmet food and wine regions with a stay at The Sebel Busselton, a modern property with luxe apartment-style accommodation, located a scenic two-and-a-half-hour drive south of Perth near the azure waters of Geographe Bay.

Your relaxing escape includes a day of complimentary bike hire, a bottle of red or white wine on departure, 20% discount on any winery tours with Cellar d'Or Winery Tours and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

**Travelling with family or friends?** Check out the two and three-bedroom apartment upgrades.
offer_address: 553 Bussell Highway, Busselton 6280, Western Australia, Australia

title: Beachfront Self-Contained Apartment Escape near Margaret River Wine Region
description:
Experience the enchanting, laidback vibes of one of Australia's most famous gourmet food and wine regions with a stay at The Sebel Busselton - a hidden sanctuary nestled on the pristine Western Australia coastline. Located in the beachside town of Busselton, the resort is the perfect spot for a gorgeous getaway in the Margaret River region. With award-winning wineries, cellar doors and chef-hatted restaurants serving gourmet food for the adults and endless beaches and two resort-style pools for younger travellers, there's something for everyone on this relaxing escape.

Within close reach, you can discover the beauty of Margaret River, renowned for being home to some of the country’s best wineries, restaurants and markets - the hardest part will be deciding which of the area’s vineyards to visit first. Busselton itself is a gorgeous, picturesque town with pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters overlooking Geographe Bay, home to the historic Busselton Jetty, an amazing spot for fishing, snorkelling, sailing and scuba diving.
offer_address: 553 Bussell Highway, Busselton 6280, Western Australia, Australia

title: Newly Renovated Busselton Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Welcome Bottle of Wine & Outdoor Pool
description:
This retro resort, just moments from the coast, is the perfect base for exploring stunning Busselton and the broader Margaret River region. Lounge by the pool, stroll beside the Vasse River or wander along the iconic Busselton Jetty - less than a 10-minute ride on the hotel's complimentary bikes. The region's renowned wineries, craft breweries and vibrant food scene are all within reach, ensuring there's always something new to discover.

Fun-filled days await with many onsite activities, including a tennis court, lawn games and board games. Savour laid-back Indian cuisine at The Curry Port, or cook up a storm at the outdoor BBQ facilities. Enjoy a welcome bottle of wine, a daily breakfast hamper and the flexibility of 12pm early check-in and 11am late checkout - the ultimate recipe for relaxation.
offer_address: 70 Causeway Road, Busselton, Western Australia 6280, Australia

title: Margaret River Region Luxe Two- Three- and Four-Bedroom Houses with Direct Beach Access & Infinity Pool
description:
Dreamy and spacious, these beachfront houses overlooking Geographe Bay in southwest Western Australia are ideal for relaxing, extended family gatherings and wine-laced group trips, accommodating anywhere from six to ten guests. Nestled on 8.5 acres of peppermint tree woodland, these self-contained retreats are just a short drive from the renowned Margaret River wine region.

The crowning jewel is direct beach access, where you can enjoy your slice of Geographe Bay’s white sandy shores and pristine waters.

Busselton is the gateway to Margaret River’s wine region, and in less than a 30-minute drive, you will be at some of the region’s best cellar doors. If you're after the perfect introduction, look no further than a wine tasting at one of the local vineyards or wander the serene stretches of white sand beaches to the picturesque Busselton Jetty.

After a day of sipping and dining, return for a swim in the exquisite onsite lap pool.
offer_address: 605 Bussell Highway, Busselton, Western Australia 6280, Australia

The resort caters to all with two inviting pools, a fitness centre, games room, jacuzzi and squash and tennis courts.
